TopicTitle: To all you modders- you guys are fantastic.

Articles.Content:
(Not sure if this is in the right place, but here goes)

I've just upgraded to .23, wondered if there was any word about forthcoming mod updates, and already there are mods which have been updated! I just want to say how much I appreciate the effort you guys put in to this game.
I third that. KSP wouldn't be as good as it is without you guys
Yep, this game is lucky to get this awesome team of modders around.
It's always funny to see modders get up to full speed updating their mods as soon as they can. I myself have updated three mods yesterday.
